column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I head to the beauty salon where my sister works as a hair dresser so I can get a hair cut .
#text=She always knows when I am coming so I never have to wait in line .
#text=I sit down in the chair and say '' `` the usual . '' ''
#text=She cuts the sides first and asks if I want to do something different with the top of my head but I always decline and like to keep my normal hair cut .
#text=When she 's all done cutting she blow drys the hair off of me .
#text=When that 's done I walk over to the sink to get my hair washed because there is a lot of little hair pieces that might get in my clothes and make me itchy .
#text=She shampoos and conditions my hair then dries my hair with a towel .
#text=I never have to pay full price so I give my sister a nice tip on the side .
#text=Getting my hair cut is always fun .
